name: Jason
comment: Fantastic seller, got my son a watch for his graduation and quality and condition was perfect!

comment: Bougt a pair of earrings for a wedding, looked perfect with my outfit! Delivery was quick.

comment: Delivery took a while but the seller responds quickly

comment: Bought a ring to propose to my girlfriend, she said no.

comment: Great communication, reasonable price for good quality products
